name: Sea of Screams
description:
You've crashed your boat. Again. I guess it's time to get rescued. Again.
This place looks different though. It looks loud. And the crabs look pretty angry.
Charge up the Screamservatory with the screams of the island's monsters and get heard before you lose yourself to the startling atmosphere of this spooky place!

Controls & Stuff

  • Analog Stick or WASD - Frantically dash about.
  • Controller Btn or SPACEBAR - Interact with the screamscape around you.
  • Controller Btn or E - Unleash a bottled scream.
  • Controller Btn or SHIFT/CTRL - Sneaky sneaky!
  • Download and play. 

Created for Global Game Jam 2021 in the remote luxuries of our own homes by:

STICKY BISCUITS (of course)!

Nina - @rainysector
David - @phosphoer
Marshall - @keyp3r

And one honorary biscuit:
